title: FR-001 Model management (providers and models)
description:
Centralize provider/model configuration in one settings area with validation and export/import.

Scope:
- Provider CRUD (API keys, endpoints, timeouts)
- Per-provider model list management (name, id, notes, language support)
- Test connection action with clear error reporting
- Export/import provider configurations
acceptance_criteria:
- Providers can be created, edited, deleted, and set as default
- Model lists are editable per provider with display names and capabilities
- Test connection validates auth and endpoint, surfaces errors
- Import/export preserves all provider settings

title: FR-005 Custom dictionary (spellings + replacements)
description:
Define custom spellings and replacement rules applied after transcription.

Scope:
- Two lists: correct spellings and replacement rules
- Import/export dictionary (JSON/CSV)
- Apply to live and audio-file transcription
- Optional per-language scoping
acceptance_criteria:
- Spellings and replacements can be created/edited/deleted
- Import/export round-trips without data loss
- Applied consistently to live and audio file results
- Language scoping can be set per entry

title: FR-002 Expanded transcription providers
description:
Add additional cloud STT providers and custom provider profiles beyond current set.

Scope:
- Provider-specific settings (API key, endpoint, model list, language support)
- Consistent error handling with retry/backoff
- Capability detection (streaming, language list, diarization when available)
- Leverages FR-001 model management UI/storage
acceptance_criteria:
- New providers can be configured and used with existing pipeline
- Errors are normalized and retries follow policy
- Capabilities are visible per provider/model
- Custom provider profiles supported

title: FR-004 Context-aware AI enhancement
description:
Inject optional context into enhancement prompts using clipboard, selected text, and screen content.

Scope:
- Toggles for clipboard, selected text, screen context
- Explicit permission flow and visibility of captured context
- Context captured only at transcription time
- Clear privacy messaging and opt-in defaults
acceptance_criteria:
- Context toggles exist and are off by default
- Permissions are requested explicitly with previews of captured context
- Context is captured only at transcription time
- Privacy messaging is shown in settings and capture UI

title: FR-007 Trigger words to auto-switch prompts
description:
Detect spoken trigger words to auto-enable enhancement and select a prompt.

Scope:
- Per-prompt trigger word list
- Strip trigger words from output safely
- Temporary prompt override that auto-restores after completion
acceptance_criteria:
- Trigger words can be configured per prompt
- Detected trigger words are removed from final output
- Prompt selection auto-restores after transcription completes

title: FR-003 Power Mode profiles (per-app)
description:
Auto-apply transcription/enhancement settings based on foreground app context.

Scope:
- Profile creation UI with app/package matching rules
- Auto-apply profile on app focus with manual override
- Profile settings: model, language, prompt, enhancement, auto-send
- Default profile and priority ordering
acceptance_criteria:
- Profiles can be created with app/package matching rules
- Active profile changes on app focus; user can override
- Profile settings cover model/language/prompt/enhancement/auto-send
- Priority ordering resolves conflicts with a default fallback

title: FR-006 Enhancement prompt library (Smart Modes)
description:
Provide multiple enhancement prompts with icons, descriptions, and quick selection.

Scope:
- Create/edit/delete prompts with title, icon, template
- Select active prompt from keyboard UI
- Persist prompts locally and include in settings export
acceptance_criteria:
- Prompt CRUD with title/icon/template works
- Active prompt can be selected quickly in UI
- Prompts persist across restarts and export/import

title: FR-008 AI assistant mode
description:
Add assistant prompt mode that returns direct answers rather than cleanup text.

Scope:
- Assistant mode with distinct instruction template
- UI distinction between assistant and cleanup modes
- Uses context capture toggles when enabled
acceptance_criteria:
- Assistant mode can be selected as a prompt
- UI clearly differentiates assistant output
- Context capture toggles are respected in assistant mode
